vision.paragraph2: This is more than online gaming — it’s a strategic adventure. Every player is the protagonist of their story, writing a unique journey through every choice and decision.

story.paragraph1: 99U Casino was born from boundless imagination and a passion for digital entertainment.
story.paragraph2: We believe every game is more than winning or losing — it's about experiencing risk, opportunity, and wisdom. Every bet and strategy tells your gambling story.
story.paragraph3: Whether you’re a newcomer or a seasoned player, 99U is your platform to realize strategies and pursue your wealth goals.

mission.p2: At 99U, betting is more than luck — it’s about vision, judgment, and strategic thinking.
mission.p3: We apply innovative crypto use, a robust gaming system, and transparent blockchain tech so players can enjoy and earn at the same time.

Inspire strategic thinking in players, making each bet more meaningful
Let players experience the satisfaction and achievement of smart decisions
mission.p4: We believe wealth isn’t just about the result, but the decisions and insights made along the way.

meta.title: Terms of Service
meta.description: Welcome to our Terms of Service. Learn about how we collect and use your data.

Service.intro: Welcome to our application (hereinafter referred to as 'the Service'). To protect your personal information and help you understand how we collect, use, disclose, and protect your data, please read the following terms carefully.

section1.title: 1. By Using the Service, You Agree to the Following Policy
section1.paragraph1: By choosing to use this Service, you acknowledge and agree that we will collect and process your information in accordance with this policy.

section2.title: 2. Types of Data We Collect
list1: Name and email address
Device identifiers and IP address
Usage behavior and diagnostic data (e.g., browser type, operating system, usage time, etc.)

section3.title: 3. Purpose of Using Personal Data
list1: To provide and maintain the quality of our services
To optimize user experience and improve functionality
To provide technical support and user assistance
To send system notifications and important updates

section4.title: 4. Principles of Information Disclosure
section4.paragraph1: We do not sell, trade, or transfer your personal data to third parties. However, we may disclose information in the following cases:
list1: To comply with legal or governmental authority requirements
To protect the rights, property, and safety of ourselves or others
With your explicit consent in other situations

section5.title: 5. Data Security and Protection
list1: All data is encrypted and securely stored
Protected by Cloudflare and firewall technologies
Access to servers is only allowed through VPN authentication
All servers and backups are securely encrypted and stored with offsite redundancy

section6.title: 6. Cookie Policy
section6.paragraph2: Cookies are small text files stored on your device to recognize you when you revisit our website.
list1: Preference settings
Maintaining login status
Tracking site traffic and sources
section6.paragraph7: You may control or disable cookies via your browser settings.

section7.title: 7. Policy for Underage Users
section7.paragraph1: This service is not intended for users under the age of 18. If you are a minor, you must obtain consent from your parent or guardian before using the Service.

section8.title: 8. Changes to the Privacy Policy
section8.paragraph1: We reserve the right to update this policy at any time. Any changes will be posted on this page, and significant changes will be announced through the application.

section9.title: 9. International Data Transfers and Third-Party Sharing
section9.paragraph1: When legally necessary (e.g., customer support), we may share data with third parties, including:
list1: Zendesk Inc.: For processing online chats and customer support emails (e.g., user name and email address)

section10.title: 10. Data Deletion and User Rights
section10.paragraph1: If you wish to delete your personal data, please contact us to submit a request. However, if certain data must be retained according to legal regulations, we may not be able to delete it immediately.

section11.title: 11. Data Breach Notification
section11.paragraph1: In the event of a personal data breach, we will notify users within the legal timeframe as required by GDPR or other applicable laws.

section12.title: 12. Issue Reporting and Support
section12.paragraph1: If you encounter any issues while using the Service, please provide the following information to help us address the problem quickly:
list1: Your username
Time and description of the issue
Error screenshots (if any)
Game ID or table name (if applicable)
section12.paragraph2: If you have any questions about these terms, please contact us through our customer support channels.

vision.paragraph1: 99U Casino is dedicated to creating an entertainment world that combines cryptocurrency with immersive experiences, guiding players through a unique journey between cash and digital assets.

Policy.title: Privacy Policy

meta.title: Privacy Policy
meta.description: We value your personal data and privacy. Please read the full policy below.

Policy.intro: We place great importance on your personal data and privacy. In accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act and relevant regulations, we are committed to handling and protecting your information appropriately. Please read the following policy to understand how we collect, use, retain, and protect your data.

section1.title: 1. Data Collection and Usage Purposes
list: By using this website and participating in our games, you acknowledge and agree that we may collect and use your personal information within the necessary scope to provide a complete service experience.
The personal data we collect will be used solely for the following purposes:
sublist: Assist you in participating in games and performing related actions
Provide game support and customer service
Send game updates, new features, events, and promotional offers that may interest you
section1.note: If you do not wish to receive any promotional content, you may unsubscribe or notify us to stop such messages at any time.

section2.title: 2. Data Protection and Legal Compliance
list: We are committed to protecting all collected personal data in accordance with the Personal Data Protection Act and best business practices, ensuring it is not accessed, used, or disclosed without authorization.
All data processing is limited to lawful, justified, and specific purposes, and your privacy is respected at all times.

section3.title: 3. Third-Party Disclosure Policy
list: We will not provide your personal information to any third party unless required by law or necessary to fulfill business operations.
However, we may disclose your data to partners, system providers, or service vendors in the following circumstances:
sublist: To execute game functions and maintain services
section3.note: These parties may only access your data within the scope required to perform their duties and must comply with this privacy policy's confidentiality terms.

section4.title: 4. Data Access and Retention
list: We will retain your personal data to maintain your service relationship and account operations.
Unless required by law or for maintaining cooperative records, we will not retain or destroy any data without reason.
You have the right to request access, review, supplement, correction, or deletion of your personal data held by us. Please contact our support team if you wish to exercise these rights.

section5.title: 5. Cookie Policy
list: To enhance your website experience and service quality, we use cookies to collect browsing information such as device identifiers and visit history.
Cookies help us remember your preferences and improve website functionality.
If you do not wish to accept cookies, you may disable them in your browser settings. However, this may affect or limit certain website features.

Policy.note: If you have any questions regarding this privacy policy or wish to exercise your rights related to personal data, please feel free to contact us. We will be happy to assist you.

account.question: What should I do if I forget my password?
account.answer: If you forget your password, please contact our dedicated customer support team. We will help you reset your password to ensure you can log in smoothly.

account.question: Can I change my username?
account.answer: Currently, the system does not support changing usernames. If you wish to use a different name, we recommend deactivating your current account and registering a new one.

account.question: How do I become a VIP member?
account.answer: Once you start your gaming journey on 99U, your VIP level will accumulate automatically. You can check your current VIP status and benefits at any time in the 'Personal Center'.

wallet.question: How do I top up?
wallet.answer:
1. Go to the [Top-up] page, copy the displayed wallet address or scan the QR code to complete the payment.
2. If using fiat currency, please select the currency you want to top up and follow the instructions.

wallet.question: How do I withdraw?
wallet.answer: Please go to the [Withdraw] page, enter your wallet address and the amount you wish to withdraw, and pay attention to the applicable fees.

wallet.question: How long does it take to top up or withdraw?
wallet.answer:
Each transaction on the blockchain usually takes 3–5 minutes to confirm. However, times may vary depending on network congestion and fee settings.
If you encounter any issues, feel free to contact our support team for assistance.

fairness.question: Are the games fair and transparent?
fairness.answer: Our gaming system is built on Ethereum and TRON blockchains. All core logic and data are publicly transparent and tamper-proof.

technical.question: What should I do if the game lags or encounters issues?
technical.answer: Please try refreshing the page first; most issues can be resolved immediately. If problems persist, contact our technical support team for assistance.

other.question: What if I have more questions?
other.answer: Feel free to contact us through customer support or our community. We’re here to help you.

Casino.title: Responsible Gambling and Protection of Minors

meta.title: Responsible Gambling
meta.description: We are committed to promoting healthy gambling behavior and preventing minors from participating.

Casino.intro: At 99U Casino, we are committed to promoting responsible entertainment. Online gambling should be viewed as a form of leisure, not a way to earn income or solve financial problems.

section1.title: Stay Rational and Enjoy the Game
section1.intro: We encourage all players to keep the following principles in mind before playing:
list: Gambling should be for entertainment only. Do not treat it as a tool to get rich or resolve debt.
Regularly review the time and money you spend on the platform and establish self-discipline.
If you feel a loss of control over gambling, consider taking a break and seeking help.

section2.title: Minors Are Strictly Prohibited
section2.intro: 99U Casino only accepts users aged 18 or above. We take all reasonable steps to prevent minors from accessing our platform, including:
list: Implementing age verification and identity checks
Reserving the right to request valid identification from players
Immediately blocking access and accounts upon detection of underage users

section3.title: Parental Responsibility
section3.p1: We understand that in the digital age, it is challenging to completely prevent minors from being exposed to gambling content. Therefore, we sincerely urge parents and guardians to actively participate in guiding children away from inappropriate websites.
section3.p2: We recommend parents use professional parental control software to restrict access to gambling platforms:

Casino.conclusion: 99U Casino values the health and safety of every player. If you or someone you know has concerns about gambling, please seek help. We support your wise decisions, rational play, and healthy entertainment.

howToQualify.question: How do I know which promotions I am eligible for?
howToQualify.answer: Once you become a valid 99U member, most promotions are automatically available to you. For special events like welcome bonuses or exclusive campaigns, please read the terms and wagering requirements in advance. Refer to official announcements or customer support for details.

doubleClaim.question: I already claimed the 100% first deposit bonus. Can I also get other rewards or cashback?
doubleClaim.answer: Most promotions can be combined if all requirements are met. However, some events may have conflicts or specific restrictions. Please refer to the official announcements or contact support for clarification.

validBet.question: What is considered valid betting?
validBet.answer: “Valid bets” refer to actual wager amounts after excluding hedging, invalid, or canceled bets. Abusive methods such as hedging may be excluded from valid turnover and are subject to penalties.

rebateTime.question: When will my rebate or affiliate commission be distributed?
rebateTime.answer: Under normal circumstances, daily rebates and commissions are issued automatically between 00:00–02:00 (UTC+8) the following day. Delays may occur during holidays or maintenance. Please refer to official updates or support replies.

earlyWithdraw.question: If I request a withdrawal early, will it affect my ongoing promotions or bonus?
earlyWithdraw.answer: Most promotions require you to meet specific wagering multipliers before bonus funds can be withdrawn. Withdrawing early may result in forfeiting promotion eligibility and remaining bonus. Ensure all conditions are fulfilled before withdrawing.
